title: BoardGameGeek Hotness
content:
1. **Brass: Pittsburgh**
*2026*
Take part in the United States' late 19th-century industrial boom.
![Brass: Pittsburgh](toplist_images/bgg_7daac123.jpg)

2. **The Old King's Crown**
*2025*
Out-manoeuvre your rivals as you vie for control of an ancient, crumbling kingdom.
![The Old King's Crown](toplist_images/bgg_55bf4298.jpg)

3. **Tigris & Euphrates**
*1997*
Keep your Mesopotamian civilization in perfect balance through revolutions and wars.
![Tigris & Euphrates](toplist_images/bgg_94e21cfd.png)

4. **Cozy Stickerville**
*2026*
Build your village with over 800 stickers! 
![Cozy Stickerville](toplist_images/bgg_59f08e87.png)

5. **Magical Athlete**
*2025*
Pit a cast of crazy characters against each other in a madcap race to the finish.
![Magical Athlete](toplist_images/bgg_cdc09fec.png)

6. **Nippon: Zaibatsu**
*2026*
Control conglomerates of companies driving Japan’s economy.
![Nippon: Zaibatsu](toplist_images/bgg_495756d9.png)

7. **The Lord of the Rings: Fate of the Fellowship**
*2025*
As members of The Fellowship, embark on a journey to save—or doom—Middle-earth.
![The Lord of the Rings: Fate of the Fellowship](toplist_images/bgg_f18732fe.png)

8. **SETI: Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence**
*2024*
Search for signs of alien life by launching probes and analyzing distant signals.
![SETI: Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence](toplist_images/bgg_c313cbbc.jpg)

9. **Speakeasy**
*2025*
Earn money running a Manhattan speakeasy business during Prohibition.
![Speakeasy](toplist_images/bgg_60ee3e12.jpg)

10. **Corps of Discovery: A Game Set in the World of Manifest Destiny**
*2025*
Explore America and rid the land of the invasive monsters that have appeared.
![Corps of Discovery: A Game Set in the World of Manifest Destiny](toplist_images/bgg_395437d9.jpg)

11. **Brass: Birmingham**
*2018*
Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution.
![Brass: Birmingham](toplist_images/bgg_c016964f.jpg)

12. **Voidfall**
*2023*
Repel the Voidborn and restore Domineum in this space themed, heavy Euro.
![Voidfall](toplist_images/bgg_733aa58a.jpg)

13. **Ark Nova**
*2021*
Plan and build a modern, scientifically managed zoo to support conservation projects.
![Ark Nova](toplist_images/bgg_ffd987dc.jpg)

14. **For the Gods!**
*2026*
Conquer the Greek islands by building towering monuments to the Gods. 
![For the Gods!](toplist_images/bgg_380f04d1.png)

15. **Forage**
*2026*
Explore, gather, combo, and craft gifts as you forage in the Pacific Northwest!
![Forage](toplist_images/bgg_4fc3b200.png)

16. **Extraction**
*2026*
On a doomed starship, rescue as many innocent souls as possible before time runs out.
![Extraction](toplist_images/bgg_5d23a8f8.jpg)

17. **Arcs**
*2024*
Rule the galaxy with your court, fleet, and cities.
![Arcs](toplist_images/bgg_fd3ea99a.png)

18. **Harmonies**
*2024*
Create your own landscape and habitats to welcome animals.
![Harmonies](toplist_images/bgg_df2b02ef.png)

19. **Ora et Labora**
*2011*
Manage workers and resources to build up the land around your medieval monastery.
![Ora et Labora](toplist_images/bgg_66622346.jpg)

20. **Spirit Island**
*2017*
Island Spirits join forces using elemental powers to defend their home from invaders.
![Spirit Island](toplist_images/bgg_769275a0.jpg)

21. **Heat: Pedal to the Metal**
*2022*
Push your car to the limit in the pursuit of victory, but don’t overheat!
![Heat: Pedal to the Metal](toplist_images/bgg_3e8ab5ab.png)

22. **Eternal Decks**
*2025*
Can you solve each stage before your deck runs out?
![Eternal Decks](toplist_images/bgg_fd064849.png)

23. **Carnuta**
*2026*
Manage your runes and create combinations with your ingredients
![Carnuta](toplist_images/bgg_7b89aaf6.jpg)

24. **Slay the Spire: The Board Game**
*2024*
Craft a unique deck, discover powerful relics, and Slay the Spire together!
![Slay the Spire: The Board Game](toplist_images/bgg_12fca928.png)

25. **Dice Horde**
*2026*
Roll & Write meets Tower Defense!
![Dice Horde](toplist_images/bgg_8109ab13.jpg)
author: boardgamegeek.com

title: BoardGameGeek Bestsellers (Fallback to Plays)
content:
1. **Flip 7**
*13 months on the list*
Score the cards in front of you, or take another card, risking everything you hold?
![Flip 7](toplist_images/bgg_962eddc4.jpg)

2. **Harmonies**
*21 months on the list*
Create your own landscape and habitats to welcome animals.
![Harmonies](toplist_images/bgg_fea60991.png)

3. **Castle Combo**
*16 months on the list*
Combine Medieval villagers and castle dwellers to score points.
![Castle Combo](toplist_images/bgg_ee634fa0.png)

4. **Ark Nova**
*49 months on the list*
Plan and build a modern, scientifically managed zoo to support conservation projects.
![Ark Nova](toplist_images/bgg_71578c36.jpg)

5. **Wingspan**
*85 months on the list*
Attract a beautiful and diverse collection of birds to your wildlife preserve.
![Wingspan](toplist_images/bgg_bfdf818e.jpg)

6. **Bomb Busters**
*9 months on the list*
Players defuse bombs by deducing and cutting unseen wires of different values.
![Bomb Busters](toplist_images/bgg_7bcec222.png)

7. **Azul**
*99 months on the list*
Artfully embellish the walls of your palace by drafting the most beautiful tiles.
![Azul](toplist_images/bgg_f535fe7b.png)

8. **Terraforming Mars**
*112 months on the list*
Compete with rival CEOs to make Mars habitable and build your corporate empire.
![Terraforming Mars](toplist_images/bgg_b698011e.jpg)

9. **Forest Shuffle**
*28 months on the list*
Curate a diverse ecology with strategic flora and fauna, winter is coming!
![Forest Shuffle](toplist_images/bgg_aa20bca0.jpg)

10. **Cascadia**
*54 months on the list*
Create the most harmonious ecosystem as you puzzle together habitats and wildlife.
![Cascadia](toplist_images/bgg_8c216e6c.jpg)

11. **SETI: Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence**
*14 months on the list*
Search for signs of alien life by launching probes and analyzing distant signals.
![SETI: Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence](toplist_images/bgg_5c6d0bb6.jpg)

12. **Sky Team**
*28 months on the list*
Work together silently to land a plane under increasingly challenging circumstances.
![Sky Team](toplist_images/bgg_de2f9107.jpg)

13. **Sea Salt & Paper**
*31 months on the list*
A few delicate Origami-style illustrations and a whole marine universe comes to life!
![Sea Salt & Paper](toplist_images/bgg_38968da4.jpg)

14. **Heat: Pedal to the Metal**
*38 months on the list*
Push your car to the limit in the pursuit of victory, but don’t overheat!
![Heat: Pedal to the Metal](toplist_images/bgg_15f2013b.png)

15. **Lost Ruins of Arnak**
*61 months on the list*
Explore an island to find resources and discover the lost ruins of Arnak.
![Lost Ruins of Arnak](toplist_images/bgg_5888736a.jpg)

16. **Faraway**
*21 months on the list*
Explore a mysterious land and fulfill quests on your way back.
![Faraway](toplist_images/bgg_3d9eefd7.png)

17. **The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring – Trick-Taking Game**
*7 months on the list*
Travel from the Shire and overcome every obstacle as a team.
![The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring – Trick-Taking Game](toplist_images/bgg_700a6342.png)

18. **Agent Avenue**
*1 months on the list*
Retired spies in a suburban neighborhood race to discover each other's secrets.
![Agent Avenue](toplist_images/bgg_538d5b1d.png)

19. **The Gang**
*7 months on the list*
Bet together the order of your hands in Texas Hold'em Poker to win together.
![The Gang](toplist_images/bgg_cbb6bc40.jpg)

20. **Carcassonne**
*271 months on the list*
Shape the medieval French landscape, claiming cities, monasteries, roads, and farms.
![Carcassonne](toplist_images/bgg_3346412d.jpg)

21. **The White Castle**
*27 months on the list*
Become the most influential clan in Japan's Himeji stronghold.
![The White Castle](toplist_images/bgg_691881e9.jpg)

22. **Splendor**
*141 months on the list*
Renaissance merchants race to grab gems, acquire property, and please nobility.
![Splendor](toplist_images/bgg_d18ddc3e.png)

23. **The Lord of the Rings: Duel for Middle-earth**
*13 months on the list*
Play as the Fellowship or Sauron and attempt to determine the fate of Middle-earth.
![The Lord of the Rings: Duel for Middle-earth](toplist_images/bgg_0ef58bff.jpg)

24. **Take Time**
*2 months on the list*
Time beckons you to discover a multitude of challenging universes.
![Take Time](toplist_images/bgg_fbe0db39.png)

25. **SCOUT**
*40 months on the list*
Poach your opponents' artists and outdo each other's circus shows.
![SCOUT](toplist_images/bgg_3f6959ab.png)
author: boardgamegeek.com
